data.text: Launching later this month, our December issue of F&D magazine focuses on the economics of #climatechange. You won't want to miss this. Stay informed by signing up to our weekly F&D newsletter at https://t.co/mdxGXFhFJs https://t.co/ZMlqWAT0fy

DMD Zhang: Regional integration, developing sound disaster resilience strategies to address #ClimateChange, and a stronger private sector are key elements to help achieve a more inclusive and sustainable growth for the Caribbean. https://t.co/4FBjvESCix #CaribbeanTransformation https://t.co/aBKr3qREy9
A map of #inequality within countries on the #IMFBlog https://t.co/jX7xNUxw6t https://t.co/68bUZDKJxp

European Economic Outlook report calls for reinvigorating reforms  to:
◾Raise labor force participation
◾Improve human capital & infrastructure                   
◾Strengthen governance

More, download the #REOeurope report. https://t.co/sjIVTg9ZSv https://t.co/YbkLZ60Z6i

Global debt has reached an all-time high of $188 trillion. When are debt levels too high? Tune in to this year’s #ARCPolak conference including remarks by @KGeorgieva, a debate with @ojblanchard1 and @krogoff and a presentation by Harvard’s Jeremy Stein. https://t.co/jPT6oggGzR https://t.co/IbKKn4r35A

Falling behind because of #inequality: regions in a country with high unemployment rates have on average a 70% chance of remaining behind. Will they ever catch up? Read today’s #IMFBlog https://t.co/jX7xNUxw6t https://t.co/2rwbVVg65N
Here are six charts that tell the story of Europe’s economic health and its prospects. #REOeurope  https://t.co/DztAWfo4Jg #IMFcountryfocus https://t.co/06wqAwbrT6

Согласно Докладу о перспективах развития европейской экономики, на 2019 год в большинстве стран Европы прогнозируется снижение роста с лишь небольшим восстановлением в 2020 году. Узнайте больше о перспективах развития экономики Европы #REOeurope https://t.co/yoKc51cuf2 https://t.co/X37uXJP9z9

En el informe sobre las perspectivas económicas de Europa se proyecta que el crecimiento en 2019 se reducirá en la mayoría de los países europeos y solo se recuperará moderadamente
en 2020. Más información en #REOeurope
https://t.co/LMXNz7FB2D https://t.co/EDMPfV4eZQ

En el informe sobre las perspectivas económicas de Europa se proyecta que el crecimiento en 2019 se reducirá en la mayoría de los países europeos y solo se recuperará moderadamente en 2020. Más información en #REOeurope https://t.co/LMXNz7FB2D https://t.co/zQHbvHTYXr

Selon les Perspectives économiques régionales pour l’Europe, la croissance devrait diminuer en 2019 dans la plupart des pays européens, avant une légère reprise en 2020. Pour en savoir plus, consultez le rapport. #REOeurope
https://t.co/TzID5b0ReP https://t.co/pv6A33wmvs

Ekonomický výhled pro Evropu očekává v r. 2019 pokles růstu ve většině evropských zemí a pro rok 2020 pouze mírné zotavení. Přečtěte si vice o regionálním ekonomickém výhledu pro Evropu. #REOeurope
https://t.co/bOsBLh9NUj https://t.co/X9vSpiRl9W

Dem Wirtschaftsausblick für Europa zufolge dürfte das Wachstum in Europa 2019 in den meisten europäischen Ländern zurückgehen und sich 2020 nur leicht erholen. Erfahren Sie mehr über den Regionalen Wirtschaftsausblick für Europa #REOeurope
https://t.co/PJbSHP4KWE https://t.co/G3gTWL6zm7

Watch the Panel Discussion on the Regional Economic Outlook with Jihad Azour, Director Middle East and Central Asia Department IMF; Khatija Haque, Head of #MENA Research Emirates NBD; @Nasser_Saidi; and Alaa Shahine, Bloomberg https://t.co/wJhT0cpbFJ https://t.co/yGAOuvpm4L

The European Economic Outlook shows that growth is projected in 2019 to decline in most European countries and only modestly recover in 2020. Learn more about the  Regional Economic Outlook of Europe #REOeurope https://t.co/sjIVTg9ZSv https://t.co/JUcIEEiSYN

During his speech at the High-Level #Caribbean conference, DMD Zhang expressed his deepest sympathies to the people of #Bahamas for the loss of life and devastation caused by hurricane Dorian. “We must come together to address #climatechange challenges.” https://t.co/7bqVfuNTGI https://t.co/YmSEqliXng

IMF's Thomsen: As in the rest of the world, Europe's manufacturing and export sectors have weakened driven by vehicles and machinery. Learn more about the Regional Economic Outlook of Europe #REOeurope https://t.co/sjIVTg9ZSv @EP_ThinkTank https://t.co/ZBRnTRo84V

In his presentation of the Regional Economic Outlook @EP_ThinkTank, Thomsen, IMF's European Department Director, noted that the report indicates that growth in Europe is projected to decline to 1.4% in 2019 and slightly recover to 1.8% in 2020. #REOeurope https://t.co/sjIVTg9ZSv https://t.co/0Zb6N3UOGa

In #Jamaica, steadfast reform implementation by the authorities resulted in many milestones, including reducing public debt by 50 percentage points of GDP since 2013. 

Find out more in our latest #IMFCountryFocus interview with Alejandro Werner: https://t.co/g8PxrOMeye

Risks to the economic outlook in Latin America and the Caribbean:

◾  Falls in global growth and commodity prices
◾  Trade tensions
◾  Heightened domestic policy uncertainty
◾  Natural disasters

Check out the latest Regional Economic Outlook: https://t.co/hhb3Vo7ZLA #LatAm https://t.co/fQuN7V7a0d

Corruption deprives the poor from essential public goods like decent health care and education. Our latest #IMFCountryFocus interview looks at how corruption affects economies in the #LatAm region. https://t.co/cs3n5kk5DK https://t.co/SEPWMBdIo3

Policy uncertainty in some large LatAm countries continues to be a drag on growth, while Venezuela’s economic and humanitarian crisis continues to drive large migration flows to other countries in the region. Get informed in our Regional Economic Outlook:  https://t.co/pDjCAa2vg9 https://t.co/ti3T8uhkxr

Read our latest #IMFCountryFocus interview on the economic outlook for #LatAm, where we explore why boosting social spending and tackling corruption in the region is critical for inclusive growth https://t.co/jNCzQa4z0m https://t.co/oJz1d6lIXx

Economic prospects in the Caribbean are improving, but with substantial variations across countries as the region remains highly vulnerable to natural disasters. Read our Regional Economic Outlook for Latin America and the Caribbean https://t.co/fvrXAuL8bo https://t.co/GlFJtPBDKI

As economies in the Middle East and Central Asia become increasingly integrated into global capital markets, a central question has emerged: How can countries reap the benefits of capital inflows? We explain: https://t.co/IdXmxblPiA | #IMFCountryFocus https://t.co/yTUc4eQISi

In our #IMFCountryFocus interview with IMF’s Alejandro Werner, we discuss ways that the Latin American region can lower poverty and inequality, and why that matters for job seekers in #LatAm. https://t.co/RlyVuaDzVH https://t.co/QlJaalqRIG
